duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direction and supervise associates to support a sales-driven culture while creating a consistent customer experience.
Engage and connect with customers by providing excellent customer service through a hospitality mentality approach.
Offer information to customers on current merchandise assortment, store promotions, and events.
Execute operational processes effectively and efficiently to ensure a positive customer experience.
Drive sales by providing an inspiring environment that motivates customers to make purchases.
Actively support sales floor, fitting room, point of sale, and operational processes.
Utilize omni-channel offerings to deliver a frictionless customer experience.
Acknowledge and assist customers through company programs, ensuring efficient and accurate transactions.
Onboard, train, and develop associates to maintain a cohesive and high-performing team.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
